content.rendered:
Eldorado Stone graces the walls in the House of Rock in Santa Monica, California with rooms inspired by rock legends such as the Rolling Stones, The Boss, Tina Turner and Fleetwood Mac. The House of Rock is receiving a lot of buzz not only for its rockin’ parties but for the high-end furniture and unique features found throughout the house.

In the wine cellar revelers will find the finishing touch; Eldorado Stone’s edgy but gorgeous LedgeCut33 stacked stone in the color Birch. With its cool melody of textures and riffs of subtle color and lines, you can just picture Mick, Bono, and Bruce hanging out, throwing back a few libations and swapping stories.
